about:
Hey there!
 Passionate for creative ideas and technologies solving real life problems, I am an enthusiast in the computer science world.
 Currently, Iâ€™m working at impact.com, where I contribute to the development and optimization of a SaaS-based partnership automation platform.
 Problem-solving is my forte, and I thrive on the challenge of debugging and troubleshooting technical issues.  I have been privileged to explore and work with the US Navy, as a graduate researcher at OSU on developing innovative solutions to streamline program performance through advanced debugging techniques. 
 I'm excited to continue exploring the intersection of technology and problem-solving, making meaningful contributions along the way. Let's connect and discuss how we can make a difference together!
